text:
Hello all
I need support for a counter
`put "counter" effect on all numbers in this section. That is, the user when scrolling and when arriving in this section should see the numbers change from +0 to the final number that we have on each card.`

Reminder: You can find our developer content on HubSpot academy by going to <https://academy.HubSpot.com/results?q=developer&library=true>

Additionally we have a YouTube Channel with a developer podcast and some great developer content <https://www.youtube.com/c/HubSpotDevelopers/playlists>
Hello Everyone! I'm kunal,  and I'm a react developer. I'm new to HubSpot cms, can anyone please guide me where can i find beginner friendly resources to develop themes for CMS

Hi <@U02MUL5L5N3>,

It might be too late for this comment but still gonna try.
Make sure you set the max_width for an image when you add it as dnd_module. The default value is 200px for max_width.

I’ve just finished my practicum and here’s how the code for the image looks like

```{% dnd_module 
            path="@HubSpot/linked_image" 
            offset=0, 
            width=6,
            horizontal_alignment="CENTER",
            img={
              'alt': 'Christmas decorations',
              'loading': 'lazy',
              'max_height': '',
              'max_width': 400,
              'size_type': 'auto_custom_max',
              'src': '<https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1608824405596-3d6efd6a9c4a?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2370&q=80>'
            }
          %} {% end_dnd_module %}```
This is perfect! That `'size_type': 'auto_custom_max'` is exactly what I needed
